resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Great Chaucer Challenge: A cooperative learning game to review the Prologue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Große Chaucer Herausforderung: Ein 
kooperatives erlernenspiel, zum der Einleitung zu wiederholen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Grand Défi de Chaucer : Un jeu d'étude
coopératif pour passer en revue le Prologue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Desafio Grande De Chaucer: Um jogo de 
aprendizagem cooperativo para rever o prologue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Sfida Grande Di Chaucer: Un gioco 
imparante cooperativo per rivedere il prologue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη πρόκληση Chaucer: Ένα συνεταιριστικό
παιχνίδι εκμάθησης για να αναθεωρήσει τον πρόλογο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Gran Desafío De Chaucer: Un juego que 
aprende cooperativo para repasar el prólogo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This game employs the cooperative learning group format to review thoroughly Chaucer's Prologue to "The Canterbury Tales" and "The Pardoner's Tale" and "The Nun's Priest's Tale."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Spiel setzt das kooperative erlernengruppe
Format ein, um Einleitung Chaucers gänzlich zu wiederholen "die 
Canterbury Geschichten" und "die Geschichte des Pardoners" und "die 
Geschichte des Priesters der Nonne."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu utilise le format d'étude coopératif de 
groupe pour passer en revue complètement le Prologue de Chaucer 
"les contes de Cantorbéry" et "le conte du Pardoner" et "le conte du 
prêtre de la nonne."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este jogo emprega o formato de aprendizagem 
cooperativo do grupo para rever completamente o prologue de Chaucer 
"os tales de Canterbury" e "o tale do Pardoner" e "o tale do priest do
nun."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo gioco impiega il formato imparante 
cooperativo del gruppo per rivedere completamente il prologue del 
Chaucer "i racconti de Canterbury" e "il racconto del Pardoner" e "il 
racconto del priest del nun."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το παιχνίδι υιοθετεί τη συνεταιριστική μορφή 
ομάδας εκμάθησης για να αναθεωρήσει λεπτομερώς τον πρόλογο 
Chaucer "στις ιστορίες του Καντέρμπουρυ" και "τη pardoner 
ιστορία" και "την ιστορία του ιερέα της καλόγριας."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este juego emplea el formato cooperativo del 
grupo que aprende para repasar a conciencia el prólogo de Chaucer 
"los cuentos de Cantorbery" y "el cuento del Pardoner" y "el cuento 
del sacerdote de la monja."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JULIE SHAW
FN:JULIE SHAW
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108555</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-great-chaucer-challenge-a-cooperative-learning-game-to-review-the-prologue</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
